attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the baby P tradgedy. It is more necessary then ever, to bring back the death penalty. Cases like that of babyP, must be deterred, and the only way is to bring back the death penalty. It pains me even now to think of what happened to that poor child!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
